----------

â­ï¸ï¼šAnki Quicker (Support for Your English Vocabulary Learning)
Anki Quicker is an extension for the popular learning app Anki.

ğŸ¤–ï¼šSimplifying the Laborious Process
Normally, to add new English words in Anki, you would have to add a sentence containing the word you don't know, select and highlight the word, look up the meaning and insert it, and then manually add the audio. Anki Quicker automates some of these steps for you.

ğŸ”ï¼šMain features
â‘  .Feature for Adding Underlined Cards: This feature allows users to add cards with an English sentence on the front and the meanings of selected underlined words on the back.
â‘¡ . Feature for Adding Fill-in-the-Blank Cards: This feature enables users to add cards with an English sentence containing blanks (along with its Japanese translation) on the front, and the full English sentence on the back.

â—ï¸ï¼šWhat You Need to Use the Extension
- Anki
- Anki Connect (Add-ons)
 L How to Download Anki Connect
 ã€€â‘  Select [Tools], [Add-ons], [Get Add-ons...] in Anki to open the [Add-on Installation] dialog.
     â‘¡ Enter the code â€˜2055492159â€™ in the text box labeled as â€˜Codeâ€™ and press â€˜OKâ€™ to proceed.
     â‘¢ If prompted to restart Anki to complete the installation of Anki-Connect, please do so.

ğŸ‘€ï¼šUpcoming Updates
The automatic insertion of audio is not yet implemented, so look forward to future updates that will include these features.

ğŸ™: Feedback & Suggestions
If you have any suggestions for improvements, such as bugs, or ideas for new features, please feel free to contact me through the link below.
https://github.com/noah-00/anki-quicker/issues
